document.full_text: world number one rafa nadal moved into the quarter-finals of the madrid open without hitting a shot on thursday after his third-round opponent juan martin del potro withdrew from the clay event with a hip injury.
document.title: nadal through in madrid after del potro quits
lines_and_colors: world number one rafa nadal moved into the quarter-finals of the madrid open without hitting a shot on thursday after his third-round opponent juan martin del potro withdrew from the clay event with a hip injury.
